tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by an open redirect vulnerability in the `getSafeRedirect` method due to improper input validation, where URLs were not properly escaped, normalized, or encoded before handling redirects. An attacker can exploit this by crafting a malicious URL with an embedded redirect to a phishing or malicious site, tricking users into visiting unintended domains when they click on a seemingly legitimate link.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@payloadcms/next` library to the patch version.
